DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 1/2 , multiple dose study 6 cohort ascend dos design evaluate efficacy , safety pharmacokinetics ( PK ) MEDI0382 patient Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( T2DM ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple-ascending-dose Study Evaluate Efficacy , Safety , Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) MEDI0382 Overweight Obese Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo control study design evaluate efficacy , safety , PK MEDI0382 administer multiple daily SC dose subject T2DM . Approximately one hundred seven subject enrol across 6 cohort . In cohort 1-3 subject randomize MEDI0382 placebo ( 3:1 ) . In Cohort 4 , subject randomize 1:1 . In cohort 5 6 subject randomize MEDI0382 placebo ( 3:1 ) .
